Welcome to my personal website. I'm a software engineer who is studying computer system Engineering at Tshwane University of Technology. Over the past 3 years I helped businesses to build their software, help them to reach millions of customers online. I have attendant many hackathons, I enjoy working with a team to build software that solves human problems. I met amazing software developers through hackathons and I believe when technology used right, it can reduce most of our problems, such as disease and poverty.

Projects

including projects I am currently working on

Over these years I am at university I spent some time learning other technologies and frameworks/libraries that were not included in my syllabus. I have combined everything I learned to build the following projects:

Radserve

This project was my second paid client project, beside the trouble of dealing with a client Technical I have learn a lot about React while building the website. I have learn about state management, components design and accessing external API. Here are some feature of the website

  • Animination rich, The website has nice animanition to produce smooth user experience.
  • All components of the website are responsive to screen sizes
  • User formik API for the contact form. Visitors can send email via the website if they have questions.

JavaScript React CSS
  • Radserve A client website with modern design, built with gatsby JS,
  • Object detection in security system using openCV
  • Natour A web application that let users book for holiday, build with Node JS
  • Food forkify TypeScript web application that let users search for food recipes

Where I shine the most

Where I shine the most

I owe the skills that I have to the tech community online such as freecodecamp and the instructors who took the time to make Udemy courses, with that being said I have the following skills:

  • Web Development - I am comfortable working with javascript/Typescript and Node.js but my favorite language for web is Go. I have experience with react library and Redux

  • Mobile Development - I participated in the MTN App of the Year Awards in September 2020 where I develop android applications using android studio, java, and firebase, this experience made me feel more comfortable contributing to open source android application

  • Linux and scripting language - I have been using Linux on a desktop for 2 years and my favorite tool is the bash terminal. Using Linux made it easy when I started using cloud computing because I was familiar with most of the tools and bash scripting language

  • System Development - I am happy that I got to learn about System Development life cycle when I was at university and the software engineering module took it further were got to learn about agile development.

  • Database Management - I have experience with SQL query language using oracle database and have an understanding of the relation database such as MangoDB
